metadata.title: USN-4160-1 -- UW IMAP vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that UW IMAP incorrectly handled inputs. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary OS commands.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4160-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libc-client2007e - 8:2007f~dfsg-5ubuntu0.18.04.2 uw-mailutils - 8:2007f~dfsg-5ubuntu0.18.04.2 libc-client2007e-dev - 8:2007f~dfsg-5ubuntu0.18.04.2 mlock - 8:2007f~dfsg-5ubuntu0.18.04.2 No subscription required
